descripcion: Development in various small and big projects that use mostly web technologies.

Development of a web application and enterprise service bus for a shipping company that lets them carry out their daily operation. Investigation of various technologies to land contracts with new clients.

I developed a business application in JavaEE with a group of 12 developers following a complete development process (analysis, design, construction and testing). The development was done using Scrumâ€™s agile framework. I also made contributions to a maintenance project of a business application built on .NET.

nombreCargo: Class Monitor: Algorithmic and Object Oriented Programming 1, Algorithmic and Object Oriented Programming 2
descripcion: I provided aid to students during practical Java programming sessions and I also graded workshops and exams.

I provided personal classes to students enrolled in any of the basic programming and algorithmic courses. These students were usually at risk of failing the course or were advised by teachers to go to Cupitaller.
